metadata.Title: CVE-2023-28260 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
.NET DLL Hijacking Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-28260` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

aspnetcore-runtime-6.0 - 6.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.10.1
aspnetcore-targeting-pack-6.0 - 6.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.10.1
dotnet-apphost-pack-6.0 - 6.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.10.1
dotnet-host - 6.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.10.1
dotnet-hostfxr-6.0 - 6.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.10.1
dotnet-runtime-6.0 - 6.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.10.1
dotnet-sdk-6.0 - 6.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.10.1
dotnet-sdk-6.0-source-built-artifacts - 6.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.10.1
dotnet-targeting-pack-6.0 - 6.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.10.1
dotnet-templates-6.0 - 6.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.10.1
dotnet6 - 6.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.10.1
netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1 - 6.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.10.1
No subscription required

aspnetcore-runtime-7.0 - 7.0.105-0ubuntu1~22.10.1
aspnetcore-targeting-pack-7.0 - 7.0.105-0ubuntu1~22.10.1
dotnet-apphost-pack-7.0 - 7.0.105-0ubuntu1~22.10.1
dotnet-host-7.0 - 7.0.105-0ubuntu1~22.10.1
dotnet-hostfxr-7.0 - 7.0.105-0ubuntu1~22.10.1
dotnet-runtime-7.0 - 7.0.105-0ubuntu1~22.10.1
dotnet-sdk-7.0 - 7.0.105-0ubuntu1~22.10.1
dotnet-sdk-7.0-source-built-artifacts - 7.0.105-0ubuntu1~22.10.1
dotnet-targeting-pack-7.0 - 7.0.105-0ubuntu1~22.10.1
dotnet-templates-7.0 - 7.0.105-0ubuntu1~22.10.1
dotnet7 - 7.0.105-0ubuntu1~22.10.1
netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1-7.0 - 7.0.105-0ubuntu1~22.10.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dotnet6 package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.0.116-0ubuntu1~22.10.1').
dotnet7 package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.0.105-0ubuntu1~22.10.1').
